summary.span: 在指定的二维视区边界内呈现 子对象。

span.span: Renders the children within the specified 2D viewport bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是具有三维子级的2D 视觉对象。The is a 2D Visual with 3D children. 为 元素提供必要的基础结构 。The provides necessary infrastructure for the element. 大多数用户将需要使用 元素。Most users will want to use the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位图效果由软件呈现。Bitmap effects are software-rendered. 应用效果的任何对象也都将以软件形式呈现。Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software. 不应将位图效果应用于大视觉对象或动画，因为这样可能会降低性能。Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations as this can degrade performance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Opacity : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的不透明度。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity of the .

value.span: Opacity 属性值表示为一个介于 0 和 1 之间的值，用来指定从完全透明到完全不透明的范围。

span.span: The value of the Opacity property is expressed as a value between 0 and 1, specifying a range from fully transparent to fully opaque.

value.span: 如果该值为 0，则指示 Opacity 完全透明；如果该值为 1，则指示 Opacity 完全不透明。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates that the Opacity is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the Opacity is completely opaque.

value.span: 如果该值为 0.5，则指示 Opacity 的不透明度为 50%；如果该值为 0.725，则指示 Opacity 的不透明度为 72.5%，依此类推。

span.span: A value 0.5 would indicate the Opacity is 50% opaque, a value of 0.725 would indicate the Opacity is 72.5% opaque, and so on.

value.span: 小于 0 的值将被视为 0，而大于 1 的值将被视为 1。

span.span: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.
